abstract: Gold hit another record high on Wednesday, while Asian stock markets slipped further and the euro remained under pressure — all signs of the intense nervousness that continues to dog the global financial markets despite the massive rescue package to combat the European debt crisis.

headline.main: Gold Hits Fresh High as Uncertainty Prevails
